various categories like Matrimonial, Blogs, Restaurant etc.

 Shopping Cart for Themes Purchase and Listings

using SAS EG and R tool 
3. Customer complaints/service - visualization     
4. Delinquency and foreclosure trends- visualization

Industry:  Private sector  
Service Area: Source channel analysis & opportunities for cross-sell /upsell 
Industry Segment: Insurance 
Agents Channels and the performance of these channels are key factors for business Hence 
assessing the active and inactive agents and their respective customers are sole 
responsibility of analytics team. My responsibilities comprise of Quarter wise performance of 
the sales agents using RFM algorithm and tagging the best performer with potential leads 
and while generating leads I had run propensity model using SAS, R  to see customer 
score and identify the best recommended product to be offered.  
  
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 
Industry:  Private Sector  
Service Area: Business Modeling for identifying credit risk 
Industry Segment: Banking (BFSI) - Yes Bank 
Credit Pattern & Risk Assessment:  The purpose of this research is to find the possibilities 
of defaulting of loans of a bank & building a business model to measure trust worthiness of 
the customers and to develop PD, LGD, EL model with proper validation algorithm in 
SAS Platform. 

• Evaluate the behavior transactional details of the customers and their performance 
in repayment. 

• Building up a KPI’s and Report after developing model on loan Defaulters and setting 
up a automations as well to add value to decision making process. Modeling solution 
included Logistic Regression and Decision Tree to get the solutions. 
 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 
Industry:  Public Sector  
Service Area: Redemption prediction of Mutual Funds 
Industry Segment: Mutual Fund – SBI (Mumbai) 
Redemption prediction:  Liquid Fund redemption by investors creates a liquid risk to the 
holding companies likes SBI Asset Management Co. A pattern to decode and predict the 
randomness is the objective, which would make them ready with funds provision and thereby 
avoiding unprecedented liquidation hit anytime. 

• Performed product segmentation at the initial level since each investment 
instrument carries significant pattern. Data profiling was done with the help of SMEs 
and Data transformation was performed to fit the data right for statistical modeling 
like Random forest, Decision tree, Logistics and Survival analysis using R 
tool.

2.  AUTOMATION ANYWHERE

Industry:  Private sector  
Service Area: Risk control Unit (RCU) and Underwriting 
Industry Segment: Insurance 
RCU is the risk assessment unit fully dedicated in calculating unforeseen risk in any kind of 
transactions with customers. Once the policy activation request received by RCU , they 
perform couple of checks on customers(CDD) – customer due diligence and if found any 
discrepancy physical investigation is conducted or EDD perform. For these whole process 
customers to tag under EDD or NonEDD is daunting task. The solution was developed to 
smooth out the whole process by developing a front end for the operations team with the rule 
based criteria using EXCEL VBA and automate the whole process for classification.

Service Area: CRM analytics 
Industry Segment: Bank – SBI Bank(Mumbai)

better manage customer expectations, improve customer relationship and product 
performance. This activity of integrating analytics in CRM enables SBI to use customer 
knowledge to increase customer revenue and develop a long term and more productive 
customer relations. Some key areas :

conversion, product performance and revenue across circles and Risk assessment- 
NPAs

model and solution to be build up for details insight of their existing reason of people leaving 
and at the same time understanding why people are people leaving and how to predict  
attrition. Entire activity was performed in SAS base    

• Data gathering and proper data preparation was extensively performed in order to 
get better model accuracy 

• Model was developed after identifying various segments and different model was 
recommended taking different parameter into account.

Industry:  Semi Private sector

Industry Segment: Energy & Utilities(BSES- Delhi)  
BYPL has been witnessing some challenges in Power procurement, reliability of supply and 
revenue assurance areas in the data & technology in recent years. Identifying and detecting 
the power theft is one of key challenge for them so we had addressed this area taking 
different data source system and performed predictive analytics model to reduce revenue 
losses. Used R tool for this analysis

Industry:  Private sector  
Service Area: Telecom  
Industry Segment: Tata Communication ltd(TCL Mumbai)   
Data Governance: TCL was reeling under pressure in bringing all departments to work in a 
structured single view technology where data is managed and extracted and used in logical 
sequence. Since most of the departments of TCL work in silos and manage data on their own 
that resulted in redundancies and inefficiency in data consumption. We developed their data 
dictionaries and standard mapping to all data sources and work on the data governance 
strategies with Data Steward,  Data Management team, IT team in defining how data will be 
consumed across org.

Project Details  # 3–
Accenture Solutions Private Limited
Client –Barclays

Project –Data Provisioning - EU Expansion
January  2019 -till date



Role
 Informatica, Unix, PL/SQL Developer



	

Project Profiles 

Barclaycard brings up this project in order to expand its Acquiring Business to Europe. Barclaycard has to understand different country specific clearing and settlement file format. Major requirement was to generate clearing files in country specific formats. Development of new E2E Data Provisioning Solution came as requirement to generate merchant Clearing files in German(UMSDT) and French(CB2AF) format which will then be converted to UK specific APACS format. 
My Roles and Responsibilities
· Understanding German and French specific Clearing message format. 
· Daily calls with client to resolve query regarding file formats. 
· Providing KT to new team members regarding UK(Apacs), German(UMSDT) and French(CB2AF) clearing message formats and bringing them to work with project pace.
· Working closely with test teams and providing KT about different clearing message file formats.
· Immensely worked on Design and Development of schemas for German and French E2E DP solution.
· Designed and developed complex 1-click Extraction process to extract files in German and French Clearing files using Informatica.
· Created Unix script to dynamically generate the parameter files for 1-click extraction process.
· Created Unix script for archival and removal of files generated.
· French being a binary formats, created Oracle function for converting requested data in data format specified by French specs(ASCII, HEX, Binary).
· Created Metadata for French, which served as heart for manufacturing and extraction of French transaction files.
· Assisting test to understand the specs and new request template. Supporting them to get their transaction cleared.
· Coordinating the Data Provisioning schedule with test and bank teams.


	
	Project Details  # 2–
Accenture Solutions Private Limited
Client –Barclays
Project- Data Provisioning New Scheme Implementation (Diners and UPI)
May 2018–December 2018

Role
Informatica Developer and pl/sql Developer
	
As a part of Barclaycard bPaid programme, there’s a requirement to test all the transaction processing flow due to settlement system change. Accenture proposed to simulate the whole production like setup of transaction flow from Merchant POS to Scheme through all clearing and settlement system so that transactions can be tested End to End. An automated architecture was designed to approach the requirement in which test teams will play the role of Merchant and will log transaction request in excel format which will then be picked by automated Data Provisioning solution to create the clearing file, playing role of POS machine.

My Role and Responsibilities
· Understanding the UK APACS 29B Transaction format for non Barclaycard accredited and APAC40 Transaction format for Barclaycard accredited UK based merchant.
· Understanding End to End Card Transaction flow in Barclaycard Environment, various system like authorisation and authentication system- Base24, billing and Settlement system- Bankworks, Transaction routing and Clearing system-TRACS
· Involved in solution architect team to design the architecture of automated Data Provisioning Solution.
· Coordinating with bank BA's to get functional understanding of various systems in transaction flow.
· Designing E2E automated solution to create clearing file in UK APACS standard using Informatica.
· Designing of automated ETL job that send summary consolidated reports of the requested transaction.
· Developing 1 click solution for creating clearing file for multiple requests at one run.
· Developing Informatica mapping for patching authorisation code response from Base24 team.
· Designing requirement for Java team to create online portal for submitting the transaction request.
· Experience in handcrafting of transaction for various schemes VISA/MASTERCARD/DINERS/UPI.
· Created stored procedure for validating user request as per the Data Provisioning guidelines.
· Created Unix script that dynamically generate the parameter file for processing of 1_Click Informatica Workflow.
· Created automated error report utility which will send error in transactions submitted by testers.

	

	
	Project Details  # 1–Accenture Solutions Private Limited
Client –Barclays
Project- bPaid SDMI
May 2017 – April 2018
Role
Informatica and SQL Developer
	
Barclays bPaid Programme is a massive transformation project aimed at digitalizing the Barclays Card Business division of Barclays Bank, UK. The legacy system that support the POS ad non-POS card transaction in GBP and Multicurrency are migrated to a new system called Bankworks. I worked as ETL Developer for building the Datawarehouse for the new system. The data warehouse will serve as a decision support system for Barclays Card business. The Data warehouse will also serve as source for robust reporting layer being built on OBIEE.
My Role and Responsibilities
· Implemented datawarehouse concepts like scd1, scd2, soft delete, late arriving dimension(lad), Change Capture Method(CDC).
· Developing ETL process to populate dimension and facts and reference table. 
· Proficient in creating reusable session, pushdown optimization.
· Created Informatica utility for data reconciliation across source system, different layer and target database.
· SQL query tuning using EXPLAIN PLAN, COLLECT STATISTICS, table partitions and hints in teradata.
· Extensively worked in fixing the defects from various testing phases and involved in code deployment, go live activities.
· Extensively involved in batch execution and support.
· Post go live, involved in production support activity, resolved multiple incident raised by client and business stakeholders.
